definition: to deceive/to cheat/to hoodwink/to make a wild guess
Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: He left his Montana ranch to his spinster sister.
sentences.chinese: 他把他在蒙大拿州的大牧场留给了他未婚妹妹。

sentences.english: A cowboy in Jordan, Montana rounds up bucking broncos.
sentences.chinese: 一名蒙大拿州樛登市的牛仔在赶拢北美洲野马。

sentences.english: My sister-in-law is a music teacher in a small school in western Montana.
sentences.chinese: 我嫂子是蒙大拿州西部的一个小学音乐老师。

sentences.english: Montana's "Cornflower Blue" Sapphire is known throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 蒙大拿州的“矢车菊蓝”蓝宝石被称为世界各地。

sentences.english: A city of western Montana west-northwest of Helena.
sentences.chinese: 密苏拉美国蒙大拿州西部赫勒拿西北偏西方的城市。

sentences.english: He works for the United States Geological Survey in Bozeman, Montana.
sentences.chinese: 他的作品为美国地质调查局在蒙大拿州博兹曼，。

sentences.english: Bones of the Corythosaurus have been found in Montana in the United States, and in Canada.
sentences.chinese: 在美国的蒙大拿州和加拿大发现过冠龙化石。

sentences.english: Montana is unofficially nicknamed "Big Sky Country."
sentences.chinese: 蒙大拿州非正式的称为“大天空之州”。

sentences.english: They made the discovery in the Hell Creek area in the American state of Montana.
sentences.chinese: 在美国蒙大拿州的国家，他们在地狱溪区发现。

sentences.english: I wanted to go a more northerly route across Montana.
sentences.chinese: 我想走一条穿过蒙大拿州的更靠北的路线。

sentences.english: Montana Big Sky is dedicated to making the finest quality bee products in the world.
sentences.chinese: 蒙大拿州大天空是致力于使世界上最优质的蜂产品。
